Articles.Content:
Move if this is in the wrong section.

Instead of clicking on a research icon and going over to the right side of the screen to select "Research", we should have a hotkey or be able to double click it. Just a thought.

> 
> Move if this is in the wrong section.

Done. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Also, edited the title for clarity and tagged as a Suggestion.
